Summary: RED BALL WITH WHITE LIGHTS AROUND OUT SIDE FLOATED NOISELESSLY FROM NORTH TO SOUTH AT LOW ALTITUDE THEN WENT EAST AND UP AND DISAPEARED.
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw two young people looking up as I turned east on Porter st. off of south bound Berwyn St. I looked up and saw a very,very red light with small white lights on the outside. It floated from north to south and then went to the east and up and out of sight. It was not an airplane.I was suprised to actually see a ufo.The object was very bright red.
